name: Junglehaus Cocktails | Homebar
bio:
Delicious cocktails, plants abound
🍹 🍸 - Tyler
📸 🌱 - Elise
🗺 📍 - San Rafael, CA

social_posts.post_text:
Kingston Soundsystem
.
We bring to you today another drink from @shannonmustipher that is absolutely packed with flavor.  Containing some really delicious things like suze, overproof Jamaican rum and soursop juice (available at asian grocers) it is intense, tropical and absolutely full of life.  It was our introduction to soursop juice and now we can't get enough - and if you buy some we are confident you'll feel the same.  If you don't have Shannon's book Tiki: Modern Tropical Cocktails it's a must-buy.  If you have a copy ... it's the holiday season, pick up some copies to give out as gifts.
.
Ingredients
1.5 oz overproof jamaican rum
.5 oz suze
.75 oz soursop juice
.75 oz fresh lime juice
.
Instructions
Add ingredients to shaker tin with ice and shake vigorously.  Strain into old fashioned glass filled with ice.  Garnish with pineapple fronds and lime.
.
.
.

Greenbrier’s Cider
.
You’re doing it all wrong – what’s missing this holiday season isn’t another hot beverage but rather a mouthwatering seasonal slushie.  On a recent visit to @nelsonsgreenbrier distillery in Nashville, we were greeted by not only an amazing selection of whiskey to taste – but also were enamored with their whiskey apple cider slushie that was the perfect end to an incredible tasting.  It brings in delicious fall/winter flavors and is just the thing to batch up for your end of year get togethers.  We connected with Nelson’s Green Brier who generously provided the recipe featured below.
.
All you need to do is have some foresight, freezer space and @nelsonsgreenbrier Tennessee whiskey and you’ll be everyone’s favorite at your next holiday party, guaranteed. 
.
Ingredients
500 ml Tennessee Whiskey
875 ml Apple Cider
60 ml Lemon Juice
375ml Cinnamon Syrup
1 L Water
.5 oz Allspice Dram
4 dashes Angostura Bitters
2 dashes Cardamom Bitters
1 dashes Black Walnut Bitters
.
Recommended Brands
Tennessee Whiskey - @nelsonsgreenbrier 
Bitters - @feebrothersbitters 
.
Instructions
Add ingredients to large bowl or vessel and stir to combine.  Pour contents into 2, gallon sized, Ziploc freezer bags and lie flat in freezer to freeze (24-48 hours until frozen through). Pour into blender one at a time, blend and serve in glasses of your choice with straws. 
.
Note: Given the variability in sweetness of cider – if you want to get precise and use a refractometer, you are shooting for 14-15 brix for the mixture prior to freezing.  If you skip this step you can easily taste and adjust the final product with syrup or water depending on what it needs.
.
. 
.
#カクテル #칵테일 #licor #coquetel #mixologia #cocktails #mixology #instadrink #rumartesenal #craftcocktails #craftedmixology #drinkstagram #cocktailsofinstagram #whiskey #coctel #cocktailgram #liqpic #instacocktails  #mixologist #craftedmixology #mixologia #cocktail #tennesseewhiskey #whisky #citrus #slushie #tikibar #tikituesday #tiki #tropicalvibes

Vert Chaud Épicé
.
Are you looking for the perfect, warm, chocolatey treat to enjoy over the holidays?  We've taken a traditional cocktail from the French Alps that combines herbal green chartreuse with hot chocolate and added some fantastic espelette chili vodka from @alamerespirits to bring spice on the back end to round out the sweet sipper.  The name "Vert Chaud" means "hot green". In our version we use only an ounce of green chartreuse but feel free to use up to 2 oz and bring that holiday cheer!  As for the chili vodka, Alamere makes an amazing one - check them out!  If not available near you, something that brings spice and chili flavor without sweetness is a reasonable sub (but highly recommend you seek out a bottle of Alamere). We hope one of these helps you to stay warm over the next couple weeks.  Happy Holidays!
.
Hot Chocolate Ingredients
3 cups whole milk
8 oz bittersweet chocolate
3 tbsp brown sugar
Pinch salt
.
Cocktail Ingredients
6 oz Hot Chocolate
1-2 oz Green Chartreuse
.5 oz Chili Vodka
.
Reccomended Brands
Espelette Chili Vodka - @alamerespirits 
.
Instructions
Add milk to saucepan heat until steaming.  Stir in chocolate until incorporated.  Remove from heat and whisk in brown sugar and salt.  Add green chartreuse and chili vodka to mugs.  Fill mugs with hot chocolate, stir, top with marshmallow and enjoy.
.
.
.
#カクテル #칵테일 #licor #coquetel #mixologia #cocktails #mixology #instadrink #chartreuse #craftcocktails #craftedmixology #drinkstagram #cocktailsofinstagram #vodka #coctel #cocktailgram #liqpic #instacocktails  #mixologist #craftedmixology #mixologia #cocktail #hotchocolate #apreski #greenchartreuse #christmas #holidaycocktails

A New One Just Begun
.
As New Years Eve approaches we bring you another installment of #soundtrackmyfriendsdrink - this time a Christmas/New Years gift for @scottishmixology (but y'all should make this along with us as well - the perfect effervescent sip for New Years Eve). We based the cocktail loosely around a song Jack used in one of his recent reels "Happy Xmas (War is Over)" - it's the perfect bubbly drink to sip on while reflecting on 2022 and onward into 2023.
.
So this is Christmas
And what have you done?
Another year over
And a new one just begun
.
This is a riff on a French 75 - swapping out the base for a split between Amontillado Sherry and Apple Brandy (shout out to Laird's who we've been reaching for all season), adding some sweet and tart notes with the delicious cranberry liqueur from Clear Creek, some spice with Scrappy's cardamom bitters and some sparkling wine (we bought little cans of Oro Bello blanc de blancs recently and can't get enough).
.
Ingredients
1 oz Amontillado Sherry
1 oz Apple Brandy
.5 oz Cranberry Liqueur
.5 oz lemon juice
1-2 dashes cardamom bitters
3 oz Dry Sparkling Wine
Cranberries, for garnish
.
Instructions
Add ingredients except sparkling wine to shaker tin with ice and shake vigorously. Strain into flute, add sparkling wine, garnish with cranberries and enjoy.
.
Recommended Brands
Apple Brandy - @lairdsapplejack Straight 86
Cardamom Bitters - @scrappysbitters 
Cranberry Liqueur - @clearcreekdistillery 
Sparkling Wine - @orobellowine blanc de blancs
Amontillado Sherry - @bodegaslustau 
.
#cocktail #cocktails #mixologist #drinkstagram #cocktailporn #tikibar #カクテル #칵테일 #cocktailoftheday #imbibe #homebartender #mixologia #mixologyguide #tiki #french75 #licor #sparklingwine #liqpic #applebrandy #brandy #sherry #tikituesday #newyears #champagne

Tropic Toddy
.
Maybe you have a sore throat from the holidays, or maybe it's just cold and stormy where you live - one thing that's for sure is you need a tropic toddy in your life.  Recently we took the Junglehaus camper van (lovingly named Tyson) 8,300 miles around the country and visited some amazing cocktail bars - one of which was @drasticmeasures.kc near Kansas City, who were kind enough to provide this amazing recipe for us to share with you.  If you are ever in the area, we highly recommend you visit Drastic Measures - not only did it have the best and most innovative cocktails we had in the area (and some of the most creative of the trip in general), @closecalls and the crew there provided amazing hospitality and the decor was killer.  Just our kind of place!
.
On to the cocktail which is a rum hot toddy with some clarified juice and a honey syrup infused with cinnamon and cayenne.  Both the rum and the juice blend push this winter cocktail in a decidedly tropical direction.  Since we don't have a fancy centrifuge like the bar uses at home, we used the "quick clarification" technique with agar agar from @cookingissues for the juice blend.  Although I'm sure theirs is a little more clear - we were very happy with how it came out and hope you enjoy it as well!
.
Ingredients
1.5 oz Aged Rum
1 oz Pineapple Juice*
1 oz Ginger Juice*
.5 oz Lemon Juice*
.75 oz Honey, Cinnamon and Cayenne Syrup
*Clarified
.
Recommended Brands
Aged Rum - @therealmccoyrum 5 year rum
.
Instructions
Mix juices in a batch at whatever size you plan to use and clarify (shoot us a message if you'd like to hear more on that). Assemble, stir and heat drink.  The bar serves with no garnish but we added rosemary for a little seasonal flair. Serve in mug.  Enjoy and thanks to Drastic Measures!
.
.
.

Charbonneau Way
.
It's a warm, muggy night in New Orleans and you duck into Loa, the well appointed bar within the International House Hotel, illuminated by what seems to be 100 light fixtures hanging like stars in the sky.  @abigailgullo is behind the stick and slides you a menu - each drink inspired by music and a sense of place with fanciful and enticing descriptions.  The music in the bar falters and Abigail bursts into song as she makes some phenomenal off-the-cuff cocktails for guests in the corner, in town for the weekend from Chicago.  She breaks apart the shaker tins and smells their drinks before she tastes them, allowing her nose to guide her on what to add to these perfectly customized cocktails.
.
When it comes time for you to order, inspired by the "bartender's choice" cocktails that were just made, you ask for something with Suze and let her know you love sours.  She smiles and says she has just the thing - a drink called Charbonneau Way that she created with inspiration from her French-Canadian roots.  It's perfection from the first sip - boozy, herbal and sour with a touch of rich sweetness from maple syrup.
.
Please enjoy the recipe below and give @abigailgullo a visit @loaneworleans when you're in town.
.
Ingredients
2 oz Rye Whiskey
.5 oz maple syrup
.5 oz lemon juice
.25 oz Suze
1 dash Absinthe
sprig of thyme
.
Instructions
Add ingredients to shaker tin with ice and shake until cold and combined.  Strain into couple, slap thyme sprig and lay atop coupe and enjoy!
.
.
.
#カクテル #칵테일 #licor #coquetel #mixologia #cocktails #mixology #instadrink #neworleans #craftcocktails #craftedmixology #drinkstagram #cocktailsofinstagram #nola #coctel #cocktailgram #liqpic #instacocktails  #mixologist #craftedmixology #mixologia #cocktail #whisky #whiskey #ryewhiskey #cocktailbar #suze #tiki #absinthe #canadianwhisky

Solvang Slots
.
It's Tiki Tuesday and we have a drink for you inspired by a recent visit to @highrollertikilounge .  On the central coast of California about 45 minutes north of Santa Barbara is the charming Danish-style village of Solvang.  Whether you are enamored with the windmills, wine or pastries, there isn't a better time to visit than winter when the trees and buildings are alight with holiday cheer.  High Roller Tiki lounge sits right off the main drag and is an absolute tropical, mid-century oasis.
.
The drink itself is an original riff on a Jungle Bird, inspired by the Danish town (we use Svol Danish aquavit as our base), Suze is the bitter and herbal element, Giffard vanilla liqueur adds some sweetness and bring in notes of delicious Danish pastry, pineapple juice gives tropical flair, and Scrappy's cardamom bitters are the perfect seasonal touch.  It's a nod to the "Slots o Fun" mug from this tiki bar which typically contains their very different jungle bird riff (which you can taste at the bar!). Hope you enjoy and give Solvang and High Roller Tiki lounge in specific a visit if you are in the area.
.
Ingredients
1.5 oz Aquavit
.75 oz Suze
1.5 oz pineapple juice
.5 oz lemon juice
.5 oz vanilla liqueur
2 dashes cardamom bitters
.
Recommended Brands
Aquavit - @svolaquavit 
Suze - @suzeofficial 
Vanilla Liqueur - @giffardusa 
Cardamom Bitters - @scrappysbitters 
.
Instructions
Add ingredients to shaker tin with ice and shake until cold and combined.  Fill tiki mug with crushed ice and strain cocktail into mug.  Top with more crushed ice, a straw, mint and lemon.  Enjoy!
.
.
.
#tikimug #カクテル #칵테일 #licor #coquetel #mixologia #cocktails #mixology #instadrink #junglebird #craftcocktails #craftedmixology #drinkstagram #cocktailsofinstagram #akvavit #coctel #cocktailgram #liqpic #instacocktails  #mixologist #craftedmixology #mixologia #cocktail #suze #citrus #aquavit #tikibar #tikituesday #tiki #tropicalvibes

Oaxaca de Juárez
.
At the heart of the state of Oaxaca lies Oaxaca de Juárez, its capital and largest city and the namesake for this delicious drink.  Inspired by a Manhattan we bring you a funky, spicy, smoky, tropical take on the stirred classic.  We absolutely love some of the funky agricole rum coming out of Oaxaca and as such, Camazotz is the star at the center of this cocktail.  To that we add La Luna Mezcal for smoke, Ancho Reyes for spice, Giffard Pineapple liqueur for tropical fruit, Carpano Antica for vinous notes as well as deep vanilla, and Angostura Bitters for baking spice, which orbit this delicious rum and bring a balanced, boozy and delicious cocktail we really hope you'll try along with us.
.
Ingredients
1 oz Agricole Rum
.5 oz Mezcal
.5 oz Ancho Reyes
.5 oz Pineapple Liqueur
.5 oz Sweet Vermouth
2 dashes Angostura Bitters
.
Note: This has some kick with .5 oz ancho so reduce to .25 if you like less spice.
.
Recommended Brands
Agricole Rum - @camazotzrum 
Mezcal - @lalunamezcal Cooperate
@anchoreyes 
Pineapple Liqueur - @giffardusa 
Sweet Vermouth - @carpanoantica 
@angosturahouse 
.
Instructions
Add ingredients and ice into mixing glass and stir until cool, properly diluted and combined.  Strain into martini glass and enjoy!
.
.
.
#mezcal #カクテル #칵테일 #licor #coquetel #mixologia #cocktails #mixology #instadrink #manhattancocktail #craftcocktails #craftedmixology #drinkstagram #cocktailsofinstagram #rum #coctel #cocktailgram #liqpic #instacocktails  #mixologist #craftedmixology #mixologia #cocktail #rhum #ron #oaxaca #tikibar #tikituesday #tiki #stirrednotshaken

Vespasia Cocktail
.
Driving through the windy roads, peaks and valleys in the Umbrian countryside, you approach the cobblestone streets of the idyllic town of Norcia, the birthplace of pork processing in Italy.  The Italian norcinos, butchers who specialize in pork charcuterie, owe much to their namesake which has been a culinary destination since Roman times. We went to Norcia with one meal and one meal only in mind - the phenomenal tasting menu at the Michelin starred @vespasiaristorante 
.
The signature cocktail of Ristorante Vespacia is an aperitif that I guarantee will get stuck in your head, as it did in mine.  Herbal, floral, effervescent, slightly bitter and all around delicious this is an easy cocktail to whip up and stoke you appetite for the meal to come.  We used Suze as it was the gentian liqueur we love (and have access to!) but use the gentiana of your choice.  To that you add equal parts gin and St Germain.  Stir and then top with sparkling water and you have yourself a drink that will certainly transport you to this wonderful Italian hill town seemingly untouched by time.
.
Ingredients
.5 oz Suze
.5 oz Gin
.5 oz St Germain
Sparkling Water
.
Recommended Brands
@suzeofficial 
@tanqueraygin 
@stgermaindrinks 
.
Instructions
Add first three ingredients to old fashioned glass with ice and stir.  Top with sparkling water, gently stir once more and serve.
.
.
.
#stgermain #カクテル #칵테일 #licor #coquetel #mixologia #cocktails #mixology #instadrink #aperitif #craftcocktails #craftedmixology #drinkstagram #cocktailsofinstagram #gin #coctel #cocktailgram #liqpic #instacocktails  #mixologist #craftedmixology #mixologia #cocktail #suze #ginstagram #ginlovers #highball #liqueur #digestif #italiancocktail

Don't Go Nuts
.
How does a peanut butter coconut boulevardier sound to you?  Delicious, right?  That's exactly what we thought when reading through the @claridgeshotel cocktail book which listed an enticing description of it in the intro to one of their chapters - the only problem was that specific recipe wasn't listed in the book.  So we reached out to our friend @matteo___carretta , director of mixology at Claridge's who was kind enough to provide us with a detailed recipe/instructions listed below.
.
If you happen to be in London and bump into Matteo at Claridge's (maybe in the Painter's Room Bar?) please tell him we say hi!  In the meantime enjoy their recipe below and check out their book, which is awesome.
.
Please note - I did some rounding converting these measurements to standard (from metric).
.
Cocktail Ingredients
1.25 oz Rye Whiskey (Peanut Butter & Coconut Washed)
1 oz Campari
.75 oz Carpano Antica
.33 oz Cream Sherry
4-5 dashes orange bitters
.
Cocktail Instructions
Add ingredients to mixing glass and mix with ice.  Serve over one large cube.
.
Whiskey Ingredients & Instructions
300 ml Rye Whiskey (@michterswhiskey )
80 g peanut butter
20 g coconut oil
50ml Pear Eau de Vie
.
Melt coconut oil in pan over low heat, add peanut butter and stir until smooth and dissolved.  Remove from heat and when just warm, add rye whiskey and stir.  Add pear eau de vie and store in fridge for 4h.  Strain with coffee filter and then store in freezer for 8 hours.  Strain once more through coffee filter.
.
.
.
#カクテル #칵테일 #licor #coquetel #mixologia #cocktails #mixology #instadrink #whiskey #craftcocktails #craftedmixology #drinkstagram #cocktailsofinstagram #campari #coctel #cocktailgram #liqpic #instacocktails  #mixologist #craftedmixology #mixologia #cocktail #ryewhiskey #eaudevie #brandy #tikibar #tikituesday #tiki #tropicalvibes

Dreams of Summer
.
Daruma dolls are a Japanese tradition in which the owner colors in one eye when they make a wish or goal and the other to symbolize it coming true.  As its been cold and rainy (or snowy) across the country recently, we thought it only appropriate to use our Daruma tiki mug from @tikitatsu_ya to make a cocktail that is a wish or rather, a dream of summer.
.
The heart of this drink is Midori - a melon liqueur that both symbolizes summer in our mind and rarely shows up in tiki cocktails.  To that the mint and pineapple add amazing flavor notes and the Japanese Whisky provides a non-traditional tiki base that brings body and subtle woody and smoky notes to this cocktail.
.
Ingredients
2 oz Japanese Whiskey
.5 oz Pineapple Syrup
.5 oz Melon Liqueur
1 oz freshly squeezed lime juice
Mint
.
Recommended Brands
Japanese Whisky - @suntorytoki
Pineapple Gum Syrup - @liberandco
Melon Liqueur - Midori
.
Instructions
Add ingredients (including a few leaves on mint) to shaker with ice and shake vigorously.  Double strain into tiki mug filled with crushed ice and garnish with mint.  Enjoy!
.
.
.
#tikimug #カクテル #칵테일 #licor #coquetel #mixologia #cocktails #mixology #instadrink #midori #craftcocktails #craftedmixology #drinkstagram #cocktailsofinstagram #japanesewhisky #coctel #cocktailgram #liqpic #instacocktails  #mixologist #craftedmixology #mixologia #cocktail #whisky #citrus #whiskey #tikibar #tikituesday #tiki #tropicalvibes

Our Spaniard
.
Sweet Liberty in Miami Beach (number 14 on the 50 best bars in America list) is phenomenal.  When @highalcoholcontent was kind enough to bring me, there was one drink that stood out above all others - The Spaniard.  A martini based on ingredients from Spain that is wonderfully complex - we couldn't help but make a tribute.
.
When I got home I got a little obsessed - contacted @filthyfoods who graciously sent some of their PHENOMENAL blue cheese olives (go get yourself some!) and I went out and tracked down every last ingredient @sweetlibertymia uses in this drink.  @highalcoholcontent and @spiritedshaker being the wonderful friends they are shipped me a set of the exact glasses used at the bar (from @luigibormioli ) and we got to work creating our version of this drink.  The proportions are probably a ways off from the original but let me tell you - it is delicious.  Highly recommend you recreate and visit Sweet Liberty whenever you pass through Miami.
.
Ingredients
1.5 oz Gin Mare
.75 oz Vermut Blanco
.5 oz Manzanilla Sherry
.5 oz Nardini Mandorla Grappa
1 tsp Del Maguey Iberico Mezcal
1 scant tsp Licor 43
Filthy Blue Cheese Olive
.

Blue Cheese Olive - @filthyfoods 
Gin - @ginmare 
Sherry, Vermut - @bodegaslustau 
Grappa - @distilleria.nardini 
Mezcal - @delmagueymezcal 
@licor43usa 
.
Instructions
Add ingredients to mixing glass with ice and stir until cold and properly diluted.  Pour into martini glass and add blue cheese olive.  Enjoy!
.
.
.
#martini #カクテル #칵테일 #licor #coquetel #mixologia #cocktails #mixology #instadrink #stirred #craftcocktails #craftedmixology #drinkstagram #cocktailsofinstagram #gin #coctel #cocktailgram #liqpic #instacocktails  #mixologist #craftedmixology #mixologia #cocktail #ginstagram #grappa #mezcal #agave #sherry #vermouth #vermut

Figgita Figgita Fig
.
Back at you after a little hiatus with another round of #soundtrackmyfriendsdrink - this time inspired by the song "Jump" by Kris Kross (chosen for us by @housepoured ) and one of my favorite cookies/snacks as a child, the mighty Fig Newton. 
.
The base of this cocktail is @bolscocktailsusa genever infused with sliced, dried figs for 48 hour which produces a bready, slightly sweet, very figgy base spirit.  To that we add @giffardusa Vanille de Madagascar and @angosturahouse bitters for vanilla and baking spice as well as lemon for a pop of acidity to balance the sweetness.  We top with sparking rose for a bubbly, deep, dark fruity cocktail that we hope will make you jump - try one along with us!
.
Ingredients
1.5 oz Fig-Infused Genever
.5 oz Vanilla Liqueur
.5 oz freshly squeezed lemon juice
2 dashes angostura bitters
3 oz Sparkling Rosé
.
Instructions
Add all ingredients except sparkling wine to shaker tin with ice and shake until cold and combined.  Strain into coupe, top with sparkling wine and enjoy as an accompaniment to  Fig Newtons
.
.
.
